about: Being a natural problem solver gave me a huge passion for being a developer, fixing broken code is something I greatly enjoy as it gives me something to learn. Among the many things I love about being a developer is how much collaboration is involved in making a perfect app, working with others not only helps you to improve but also gives the same opportunities for others.
Among the many skills I have been perfecting is mobile responsiveness, I feel this is an important and fundamental skill to make sure any application stands out from others.
